description: An underground resistance army formed to oppose Doflamingo's rule over Dressrosa. Led by the Thunder Soldier and allied with the Tontatta dwarves, this army operates from a hidden base beneath a sunflower field.

formation.circumstances: The Thunder Soldier organized the rebellion with the Tontatta dwarves and allied forces to overthrow Doflamingo and restore the Riku family to power.

keyMoments.description: Thunder Soldier introduces Franky to the dwarf army beneath the sunflower field, solidifying the alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Forms the core rebellion force that will challenge Doflamingo's control of Dressrosa.

goals: Restore the Riku family to power
Free the toys and restore them to their original forms
